name: Street Cat (AlexTWO)
description:
Street cat is a 60 seconds style survival game about a stray cat called Ginger. 

Ginger was bought as a Christmas present by a family who didn't realise the responsibility that comes with owning a pet and he was later abandoned on the street with nothing but a carboard box. Survive day by day, ration your precious food, and fend off dangerous predators all while trying to find Ginger a forever home.

Note: The game over screens are quite sad, play at your own risk!

Key features:

-Survival gameplay inspired by the 60 Seconds franchise

-A cute cat!

-A happy ending!

Links:

-Watch me talk about the development of this game on YouTube!

-Look out for more of my games on Twitter!

-Happy Tune - Syncopika: https://opengameart.org/content/happy-tune

-Journey to the East Rocks - Alexandr Zhelanov: https://opengameart.org/content/journey-to-the-east-rocks

-Sad Scene Pianoforte - ISAo: https://opengameart.org/content/sad-scene-pianoforte

This is my first game! Feedback is not only welcome but encouraged!
